name: malgany/php-chain
description: PHP Chain is a natural language processing library for PHP, inspired by the popular LangChain in Python. This library offers a modular and extensible approach to building NLP pipelines, allowing PHP developers to easily integrate natural language capabilities into their applications. PHP Chain supports a variety of NLP tasks, including but not limited to tokenization, semantic analysis, and text generation, providing a fluent interface and adaptable tool chains for different linguistic processing needs.
